page.title: 09THE MAY FESTIVAL OF COWBIT
page.content: On May day the children ride on decorated trailers pulled by tractors around the village.People come to wave and take photographs.We get down off the trailers by ladder. We do country dances first then maypole dances. the very little people do HERE WE GO ROUND THE MOULBRY BUSH and the older people do RED RIVER VALLY. We then sing to all the visitors before everbody looks round at the stalls and games. Next we dance around the maypole and the teachers stand at the back to untangle the ribbons incase it goes wrong. The dances we do are THE PLAIT,FOR IN HAND and THE BARBERS POLE. Refreshments are served drinks in the hall.
